main event: A round, oval object was observed hovering motionless in Boyce, Louisiana on July 27, 1960.
interesting points: The object changed colors several times, including bright white, red, and light green., No sound was reported during the sighting., The object remained stationary for the entire duration of the observation., The sighting lasted for three hours with two witnesses, a student and a visitor., The object was described as the size of an airplane, surrounded by a haze or mist.
sighted object: an oval, round object changing colors
witness description: a 13-year-old student and a 45-year-old visiting woman
